author: joyvoister
content:
GM Guys, i getting error on bootnode connect using other machine, and im running with costumize chain. 


`INFO [03-31|03:09:42.286] Looking for peers peercount=3 tried=105 static=0
INFO [03-31|03:09:51.322] Entered PoS stage`

my peer is not stable, i am running 2 geth nodes on 1 server and 2 beacon nodes, while adding bootnode to other machine it is not responding cannot connect, `admin.peers []`  but other bootnodes connect to my chain (sometimes). 

`admin.addPeer("enode://24807e3669dcce1d0ddc5fdf013d133cab87ab58d0b5cac6610d62348f2a4cda9b03ec0f7efa6273271b3a969fbe1be9ef1deecfedfdb6944329e85b53f72fa9")`

`http.api=admin,eth,net,web3,personal`
`net.listening = true`
`net. peerCount = 3`

 CL Cannot Approve the connection because after add the bootnode cannot to call,

`Execution engine call failed            error: ServerMessage { code: -32000, message: "invalid terminal block hash" }, service: exec`
